# <a name="error-550553-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="a1440-102">Fout 550/553 in Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a1440-102">Error 550/553 in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a1440-103">Wanneer u niet thuis bent en een e-mail van uw verbonden account verzendt via Outlook.com, wordt uw e-mailbericht mogelijk geretourneerd met een foutbericht van 550, 553 of relay.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a1440-103">When you're away from home and send an email from your connected account using Outlook.com, your email message might be returned with a 550, 553, or relay-prohibited error message.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="a1440-104">Uw [instellingen voor e-mailsynchronisatie controleren](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) bij **Instellingen**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a1440-104">Check your [email sync settings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2031283) at **Settings**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="a1440-105">> **Alle** > **e-mailsynchronisatie-e-mail voor\*\*\*\*Outlook-instellingen weergeven** > .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a1440-105">> **View all Outlook settings** > **Mail** > **Sync email**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="a1440-106">Zorg ervoor dat uw standaardadres hetzelfde is als uw e-maildomeinnaam.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a1440-106">Make sure your default from address is the same as your email domain name.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a1440-107">Als u uw eigen e-maildomein hebt opgenomen, wijzigt u het in uw outlook.com, live.com of hotmail.com adres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a1440-107">If you have your own email domain included, change it to your outlook.com, live.com, or hotmail.com address.</span></span>
